passives.name: Passives
passives.desc:
Outputs passive values of a unit. Defaults to damage passives.

This command can accept additional arguments found below:
• "--damage" to show damage passives.
• "--miti" or "mitigation" to show passive mitigation values.

summon.name: Summon Simulator
summon.desc:
Test your luck using the Summon Simulator! Outputs a random unit that can be summonable from the selected summon gate, replicating the rates showcased in the Global version of the game.

"h/summon" standalone will list all available summon gates, along with any custom summon gates if any. Additional arguments can be entered to summon units:

• "reset" resets your summon steps and results on the selected gate.
• "results" shows your summon results of the selected gate.

8ball.name: The 8 Ball
8ball.desc: Outputs a quote chosen at random. No additional arguments required.

choose.name: Choose
choose.desc: Outputs a choice at random. Choices are split for each `|` instance. Fails if only one choice is given.

client.name: Client
client.desc: Shows the current client version of the game.
